item.title: CVE-2023-32105|2024-09-25T14:39:01.388Z -- ollybach -- wppizza%20%E2%80%93%20a%20restaurant%20plugin
item.description: Unauth. Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in ollybach WPPizza – A Restaurant Plugin plugin <= 3.17.1 versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-33576|2024-08-02T02:36:04.284Z -- ollybach -- wppizza
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Ollybach WPPizza.This issue affects WPPizza: from n/a through 3.18.10.

item.title: CVE-2024-35766|2024-06-21T12:28:53.722Z -- ollybach -- wppizza
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in ollybach WPPizza allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects WPPizza: from n/a through 3.18.13.
